value.title: How to set up an Azure pipeline with Node JS | Azure Tips and Tricks
value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn how to create an Azure Pipeline for a Node.js application. Setting up a continuous integration process that automatically builds and tests your node.js code is very easy with Azure pipelines.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips

value.title: Create a long-running serverless workflow with Durable Functions
value.excerpt: Learn how to orchestrate a long-running workflow as a set of activities using scalable and cost-effective Durable Functions.

value.title: Configure Azure policy
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure Azure Policy to implement compliance requirements.

value.title: Configure virtual machine availability
value.excerpt: You will learn how to configure virtual machine availability including vertical and horizontal scaling.

value.title: Configure virtual machines
value.excerpt: You will learn to configure virtual machines including sizing, storage, and connections.

value.title: Connect your on-premises network to the Microsoft global network by using ExpressRoute
value.excerpt: Connect your on-premises systems and users to Azure and Office 365 by using ExpressRoute for private, dedicated, and guaranteed throughput connectivity.

value.title: Control access to Azure Storage with shared access signatures
value.excerpt: Grant access to data stored in your Azure Storage accounts securely through the use of shared access signatures.

value.title: Create a Windows virtual machine in Azure
value.excerpt: Learn to create an Azure virtual machine in minutes that can be used like a local physical desktop or server.

value.title: Deploy Azure virtual machines from VHD templates
value.excerpt: Standardize and automate your virtual machine deployments to minimize manual configuration, variance, and error.

value.excerpt: Describe the compliance management capabilities in Microsoft

value.title: Explore the services and identity types of Azure AD
value.excerpt: Explore the services and identity types of Azure AD

value.title: Host your domain on Azure DNS
value.excerpt: Learn how to host your domain on Azure DNS.

value.title: Introduction to Azure Kubernetes Service
value.excerpt: Get acquainted with the Azure Kubernetes open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management.

value.title: Build a containerized web application with Docker
value.excerpt: Learn how to use Docker to build, store, and manage private container images with the Azure Container Registry.

value.title: Introduction to Azure solutions
value.excerpt: Get started with your digital transformation by exploring why now is the right time to begin, why Azure is the right platform, and how Azure can bring overall value to your organization. We'll demonstrate key scenarios that illustrate how digital transformation with Azure can empower employees, engage customers, optimize operations, and transform products.

value.title: Define identity and access management in Azure Active Directory
value.excerpt: Learn about identity and access management in Azure Active Directory and why identity is a core component of your organization’s security posture.

value.title: Principles of cloud computing and deployment
value.excerpt: Principles of cloud computing and deployment

value.title: Set up the Rust development environment
value.excerpt: Learn how to set up the Rust development environment, write a program, and use the Cargo build system.

value.title: An overview of Azure Blueprints | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Alex Frankel (@sonofdiesel) joins Scott Hanselman (@shanselman) to discuss Azure Blueprints. Environment creation can be a long and error prone process. Azure Blueprints helps you deploy and update cloud environments in a repeatable manner using composable artifacts such as policies, role-based access

value.title: Azure Friday | Azure IoT Hub
value.excerpt: Olivier Bloch joins Scott Hanselman to discuss Azure IoT and how it is more than just about connecting IoT devices and sending telemetry to the Cloud. They also talk about Azure IoT device topics such as twins, provisioning, and lifecycle management.  For more information, see:  Azure IoT Hub - http://aka.ms/azureiotgetstarted
